content: the notes maintain moss stitch pattern as set throughout remainder three-needle bind-off method sew edge of joined neck of sleeve the left sleeve cap is taller its back edge beginning tabs to tops of sleeves and back neck of rs row end of ws row to match the taller back raglan buttons height using sewing needle and thread sew buttons to left front band at marked button positions opposite buttonholes bobble 4 4 5 5 4 4 4 4 sts at beg of next rs row then bobble 3 3 4 4 3 3 3 3 sts at beg of foll ws row then 0 0 0 weave in all remaining ends 0 1 3 3 3 st s at beg of foll 0 0 0 0 2 2 2 2 row 37 39 43 45 45 45 45 47 sts begin raglan decreases row 1 decrease k1 ssk work in patt to 3 sts rem k2tog k1 2 sts decrease d working first 2 and last 2 sts in st st repeat decrease row every 4th row 4 4 5 7 7 9 9 9 times more then every other row 4 5 4 3 3 1 1 2 time s then work 1 ws row 19 19 23 23 23 23 23 23 sts next row rs k1 ssk work in patt to 4 sts rem k3tog k1 16 16 20 20 20 20 20 20 sts next row ws p2 work in patt to 2 sts rem p2 ©2023 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 8 winter sweater kkaattee ggaaggnnoonn oossbboorrnn schematic f j d e i g h c b a a / back width at lower edge f / back neck width 18 75 20 22 25 24 5 25 75 26 75 30 25 31 25 5 75 5 75 5 75 6 5 7 7 8 8 47 5 51 56 5 62 65 5 68 77 79 5 cm 14 5 14 5 14 5 16 5 18 18 20 5 20 5 cm g / cuff circumference b / front width at lower edge 8 8 5 8 5 9 25 9 25 9 75 9 75 9 75 11 5 11 5 12 13 75 14 25 14 75 16 5 17 20 5 21 5 21 5 23 5 23 4 25 25 25 cm 29 29 30 5 35 36 37 5 42 43 cm h / sleeve length to underarm c / body length to underarm 16 5 16 5 17 17 17 5 17 5 18 18 15 38 cm all sizes 42 42 43 43 44 5 44 5 45 5 45 5 cm d / back raglan height i / upper arm circumference 7 25 7 5 8 9 25 9 5 10 5 10 5 10 75 12 5 13 25 14 75 15 5 15 5 16 5 16 5 17 25 18 5 19 20 5 23 5 24 26 5 26
